name: HexPortal
description:
Mixing geometric forms with organic movements, we might be looking at something of a hexagonal portal. Produced from an animated SVG, which was rasterized and then processed with an NEC PC-88VA (adding noise and distortion). Forever-looping at 30 frames per second.

GIF
640x640
22 frames, 30 fps

by @ecomfort_arts
January 2022
